hackathon-description-text: SteelHacks 2015 is Pittsburgh's first major MLH sanctioned hackathon. It will be hosted at the University of Pittsburgh, in collaboration with the CS department and the CS Club.
hackathon-eligibility: College students in the Pittsburgh area
hackathon-requirements: Please include a picture or video of your hack, as well as a short description.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The open source hacks with the most real world impact
Hack most applicable to a dorm room

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=University of Pittsburgh, 210 South Bouquet Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How hard was this hack to implement?
Was the idea unique and/or creative? Did it make you go "that's cool!"?
Was the hack well designed and complete (as a percentage)?

hackathon-location-address: University of Pittsburgh, 210 South Bouquet Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA
